text: pahale ke paigambaro ne tabaleege risaalat yahaan vak ki jab (qaum ke eemaan laane se) paigambar maayoos ho gae aur un logon ne samajh liya ki vah jhuthalae gae to unake paas hamaaree (khaas) madad aa pahunchee to jise hamane chaaha najaat dee aur hamaara azaab gunehagaar logon ke sar se to taala nahin jaata
